code: import moment from'moment-timezone';var sameDay=function sameDay(dOne,dTwo){var d1=moment.tz(dOne,'America/Santiago').format('YYYY-MM-DD');console.log(d1);var d2=moment.tz(dTwo,'America/Santiago').format('YYYY-MM-DD');console.log(d2);return moment(d1).isSame(d2,'day');};export default sameDay;
